verses.verse: Now it came to pass<WH5571>, when Sanballat, and Tobiah<WH2900>, and Geshem<WH1654> the Arabian<WH6163>, and the rest<WH3499> of our enemies<WH341>, heard<WH8085> that I had built<WH1129> the wall<WH2346>, and that there was no breach<WH6556> left<WH3498> in it<WH1571>; (though at that time<WH6256> I had not set up<WH5975> the doors<WH1817> upon the gates<WH8179>;)

That Sanballat<WH5571> and Geshem<WH1654> sent<WH7971> unto me<WH559>, saying, Come<WH3212>, let us meet<WH3259> together<WH3162> in some one of the villages<WH3715> in the plain<WH1237> of Ono<WH207>. But they thought<WH2803> to do<WH6213> me mischief<WH7451>.

And I sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> unto them<WH559>, saying, I am doing<WH6213> a great<WH1419> work<WH4399>, so that I cannot<WH3201> come down<WH3381>: why should the work<WH4399> cease<WH7673>, while<WH834> I leave<WH7503> it<WH3381>, and come down to you?
Yet they sent<WH7971> unto me four<WH702> times<WH6471> after this sort<WH1697>; and I answered<WH7725> them after the same manner<WH1697>.
Then sent<WH7971> Sanballat<WH5571> his servant<WH5288> unto me in like manner<WH1697> the fifth<WH2549> time<WH6471> with an open<WH6605> letter<WH107> in his hand<WH3027>;

Where was written<WH3789>, It is reported<WH8085> among the heathen<WH1471>, and Gashmu<WH1654> says<WH559> it<WH3064>, that you and the Jews think<WH2803> to rebel<WH4775>: for which cause<WH3651> you build<WH1129> the wall<WH2346>, that you may be<WH1933> their king<WH4428>, according to these words<WH1697>.

And you have also appointed<WH5975> prophets<WH5030> to preach<WH7121> of you at Jerusalem<WH3389>, saying<WH559>, There is a king<WH4428> in Judah<WH3063>: and now shall it be reported<WH8085> to the king<WH4428> according to these words<WH1697>. Come<WH3212> now therefore<WH3289>, and let us take counsel together<WH3162>.
Then I sent<WH7971> unto him<WH559>, saying, There are<WH1961> no such things<WH1697> done<WH1961> as you say<WH559>, but you invent<WH908> them out of your own heart<WH3820>.

For they all made us afraid<WH3372>, saying<WH559>, Their hands<WH3027> shall be weakened<WH7503> from the work<WH4399>, that it be not done<WH6213>. Now therefore<WH2388>, O God, strengthen my hands<WH3027>.

Afterward I came<WH935> unto the house<WH1004> of Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Delaiah<WH1806> the son<WH1121> of Mehetabeel<WH4105>, who was shut up<WH6113>; and he said<WH559>, Let us meet together<WH3259> in the house<WH1004> of God<WH430>, inside<WH8432> the temple<WH1964>, and let us shut<WH5462> the doors<WH1817> of the temple<WH1964>: for they will come<WH935> to kill<WH2026> you<WH3915>; Yes, in the night will they come<WH935> to kill you<WH2026>.

And I said<WH559>, Should such<WH3644> a man<WH376> as I flee<WH1272>? and who is there<WH935>, that, being as I am, would go into the temple<WH1964> to save his life<WH2425>? I will not go in<WH935>.

And<WH5234>, behold, I perceived that God<WH430> had not sent<WH7971> him<WH1696>; but that he pronounced this prophecy<WH5016> against me<WH2900>: for Tobiah and Sanballat<WH5571> had hired him<WH7936>.

Therefore was he hired<WH7936>, that I should be afraid<WH3372>, and do so<WH6213>, and sin<WH2398>, and that they might have matter for an evil<WH7451> report<WH8034>, that they might reproach me<WH2778>.

My God<WH430>, think<WH2142> you upon Tobiah<WH2900> and Sanballat<WH5571> according to these their works<WH4639>, and on the prophetess<WH5031> Noadiah<WH5129>, and the rest<WH3499> of the prophets<WH5030>, that would have put me in fear<WH3372>.
So the wall<WH2346> was finished<WH7999> in the twenty<WH6242> and fifth<WH2568> day of the month Elul<WH435>, in fifty<WH2572> and two<WH8147> days<WH3117>.

And it came to pass<WH341>, that when all our enemies heard<WH8085> there<WH1471>, and all the heathen that were about us<WH5439> saw<WH7200> these things<WH3966>, they were much cast down<WH5307> in their own eyes<WH5869>: for they perceived<WH3045> that this work<WH4399> was done<WH6213> of our God<WH430>.
Moreover in those days<WH3117> the nobles<WH2715> of Judah<WH3063> sent<WH1980> many<WH7235> letters<WH107> unto Tobiah<WH2900>, and the letters of Tobiah<WH2900> came unto them<WH935>.

For there were many<WH7227> in Judah<WH3063> sworn<WH1167> unto him<WH2860>, because he was the son in law of Shechaniah<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Arah<WH733>; and his son<WH1121> Johanan<WH3076> had taken<WH3947> the daughter<WH1323> of Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah<WH1296>.
Also they reported<WH559> his good deeds<WH2896> before<WH6440> me<WH3318>, and uttered my words<WH1697> to him<WH2900>. And Tobiah sent<WH7971> letters<WH107> to put me in fear<WH3372>.
